Distance from client¶

distance_from_client.currentPoseHandler(data)[source]¶

Handler to the subscriber current_pose_velocity_publisher. It receives current pose and velocity of robot and uses GetGoal function to update distance, v_average global variables

distance_from_client.getDistanceAndAvgVelocity(request)[source]¶

triggers when a call to the service is made. returns global variables which store average velocity and distance to target.

distance_from_client.getGoal(x_current, y_current, v_current_x, v_current_y)[source]¶
Calculates and returns the following:
  1. the distance between pose_current and pose_target.
  2. average velocity of the robot

Last Target¶

last_target.getLastTarget(request)[source]¶

Fetches target pose from the parameter server and returns when service is called.

Planning client¶

planning_client.initialize_publisher_subscriber()[source]¶

initializes the publishr and subscriber and stores them in a global variable.

planning_client.planning_client()[source]¶

This function is responsible to send goal pose to the action server.

planning_client.publishPoseAndVelocity(msg)[source]¶

Handler for the subscriber for /odom. This function receives odom.message and publishes pose and velocity from it on the topic current_pose_velocity_publisher.
